review: Altough still in alpha, this game still provides wonderful atmosphere of 'Role Play' and alround beautiful graphics. If you are looking for a survival FPS game, i highly recommend this one. (7.5/10 still has areas to improve and they will do over time)
Thoughtout Playing H1Z1 i encounted many people.. ive been recognised as the 'Weather Man' So I say! H1Z1 - 'Today will be cloudy with a chance of f*ck all sun' - ozRay (22/1/2015)
